item.description:
The last Friday of the month is upon us once again, which means another Critical Mass ride. For those of you who don't know, critical mass is an unofficial celebration of bicycles and other non-motorized transportation. We ride through the streets of New Haven (about an hour or so) and end up at a house party or bar. The pace of the ride is slow and it's a lot of fun, with recent rides attracting around 100-150 people, so bring your bike down to the green at 5:45 this Friday.

Tom is the contact for this event 203/444-6380
item.name: September Critical Mass
